title: Cryptshrink
author: Cryptshrink
content: This Hackathon is for any developers and crypto enthusiasts that are interested in building incredible dApps enabled with Smart Privacy using Sapphire. Or integrating confidentiality to an already existing dApp on any popular EVM supported by Celer's Messaging Bridge with the Oasis Privacy Layer (OPL). Tutorials and Standards to build with Sapphire or the OPL will be also supported for the hackathon.It is time to make a change and help evolve the Web3 towards a more data responsible future, a future were users have the control over their data and can choose what to do with it, a future where AIs respect privacy, a future where our personal data is safe.The hackathon has an 8-week duration, and offers $55.000 in grants and prizes. To find more details about the hackathon you can check these two posts:Oasis Network:https://oasisprotocol.org/p4w3-hackathonDevpost:https://p4w3.devpost.com/Thank you for your time, and good luck building.
